name: Tiny Vessels on Oak by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A small yet perfectly formed way to start a Jill Shaddock Ceramics collection.

Tiny shallow slip cast porcelain vessels created by award winning designer-maker Jill Shaddock in her Manchester Studio. Carefully selected and presented on a tiny block of Oak. 

We have one currently available:

Grey & Yellow

Both vessels have a matt finish with Jill's signature contasting light and dark banding on the rim - created by layering during the slipcasting process.

Vessel measures approx: Dia: 4.6cm x H: 2.5cm

Oak block measures: 

Grey & Yellow: L/W: 4cm x H: 2.5cm

name: Row on Walnut by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A unique curated selection of 5 exquisite slip cast ceramic vessels on an Walnut block by multi award wining Ceramic designer-maker Jill Shaddock.

The vessels are all matt finished and feature Jill's unmistakable contasting banding on the rims created during the painstaking making process of the vessel with layering of different colours of porcelain slip.

The vessels comprise:

1: Off White outer, Teal inner, contrasting banding.
2: Light Grey outer, Light Grey inner, contrasting banding.
3: Dark Grey outer, Off White inner, contrasting banding.
4: Yellow outer, V.Dark Grey inner, contrasting banding.
5: Teal outer, V.Dark Grey inner, contrasting banding.

The walnut block is hand finished and oiled lightly with Danish Oil. 

The set including wood block measures approx:
L:27cm x W:4.5cm x H:9cm

name: Curated Set of 4 by Jill Shaddock.
description:
An instant mini collection of contemporary ceramics!

This set of 4 vessels created by multi award winning ceramic designer-maker Jill Shaddock has been carefully selected and curated by Jill and Snug Owner Ed Chadwick to create a stunning collection.

Created by Jill in her Manchester Studio these exquisite signature vessels are formed from layered slipcast semi-porcelain in a labour intensive process with painstaking attention to detail.  This set of vessels sit beautifully either together as the whole grouping, or as individual pieces and represent a perfect way to start a collection of Jill's unique award winning work.

The set comprises:

1:  1x Small Vessel with teal outer with mid grey inner with contrasting dark & light banding on the rim.
Dimensions: H: 5.7cm x D: 7.2cm.
2:  1x Small Shallow Vessel in off-white outer with light grey inner and dark & light banding.
Dimensions: H: 3.2cm x D: 7.2cm.
3:  1x Tiny Vessel in off-white outer with teal inner & dark contrasting banding.
Dimensions: H: 4.1cm x D: 4.5cm
4:  1x Tiny Shallow Vessel in off-white with teal interior & dark banding.
Dimensions: H: 2.4cm x D: 4.5cm

The Oak block included has been hand-sanded and is finished with a light oiling with Danish oil giving a smooth satin finish, it measures:

H: 2.5cm x W: 12cm x L: 25cm

name: Cluster of 3 by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A nesting cluster of 3 slip cast shallow ceramic vessels in medium, small and tiny sizes by multi award winning designer-maker Jill Shaddock.  Individually created in her Manchester studio, then carefully curated into sets, no two vessels or sets are alike!

This set of vessels is made up of:
Medium: Teal outer with speckled light grey inner with contrasting pale & dark banding on the rim.
Small: Dark grey outer with light grey inner with contrasting light and grey & yellow banding on the rim.
Tiny: Dark grey outer with teal inner and contrasting light and dark banding on the rim.

Each vessel measures approx:

Medium: Dia: 9.2cm x H: 4cm 
Small: Dia: 7cm x H: 3cm 
Tiny: Dia: 4.7cm x H: 2cm

name: Cluster of 3 on Oak by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A nesting cluster of 3 slip cast shallow ceramic vessels in medium, small and tiny sizes by multi award winning designer-maker Jill Shaddock.  Individually created in her Manchester studio, then carefully curated into sets, no two vessels are alike! This set comes complete with an oak block for display.

This set of vessels comprises:
Medium: Teal outer with mid grey inner with contrasting pale banding on the rim.
Small: Mid grey outer with pale grey inner with contrasting light and grey banding on the rim.
Tiny: Mid grey outer with white inner and contrasting light and dark banding on the rim.

Each vessel measures approx:

Medium: Dia: 9.2cm x H: 4cm 
Small: Dia: 7cm x H: 3cm 
Tiny: Dia: 4.7cm x H: 2cm

Oak block measures:

L: 9.2cm x W: 9.2cm x H: 5cm

name: Small Tall Vessel by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A unique 'Small Tall Vessel' created by award winning designer-maker Jill Shaddock in her Manchester Studio.  

Finished in matt dark grey outer with matt yellow interior featuring Jill's signature contrasting banding on the rim of the vessel created during the painstaking hand slipcasting process.

This piece measures approx: dia: 7.2cm x h: 7.2cm

name: Coffee Set for Two by Jill Shaddock.
description:
An exquisite piece of slip cast semi-porcelain, sculptural ceramic tableware by award winning designer-maker Jill Shaddock.

This set comprises:

Ceramic tray in matt Teal with contrasting banding, two Vessels - matt finish Greeny Grey outer with Dark Grey inner and Mid Grey outer with Teal inner both with contrasting pale banding and a tiny tall angled Vessel in Light Grey with white inner also with pale banding.  The set includes two sugar sticks with slip cast porcelain end finishers in a lovely bright yellow with contrasting banding.

This is a fine example of one of Jill's signature pieces of tableware.

Sizes:

Tray: l: 23cm x w: 9.5cm
Vessels: h: 7.5 x dia:7
Tiny Tall Vessel: H: 7.5 x dia: 4.5

name: Vase #1 by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A small unique slip cast semi-porcelain Vase by award winning designer - maker Jill Shaddock.  This is a Series 2 Vase which features a hi-gloss glazed interior contrasting with a matt finished exterior.

Due to the making process, each of Jill's pieces is completely unique, this vase features a slash cut - angled top is finished in matt white outer with a gloss mid grey interior with grey, teal and white contrasting banding on the rim of the vase.  Perfect for a single stem flower.

Size: h: 9.5cm x base dia: 6cm

name: Vase #2 by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A small unique slip cast semi-porcelain Vase by award winning designer - maker Jill Shaddock. This is a Series 1 Vase which features a matt exterior and interior finish.

Due to the making process, each of Jill's pieces is completely unique, this vase is finished in matt teal with a dark grey interior with pale contrasting banding on the rim of the vase.  Perfect for a single stem flower.

Size: h: 9cm x base dia: 6cm

name: 'Five Cup' B by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
A textured cup in white porcelain by internationally renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto, a stunning example from her 'Five Cups' series.

This statement piece of Ikuko tableware measures approx: h: 8.5cm x dia: 8cm

Ikuko's makers mark is present on the base.

*Please note, due to the bespoke nature of this series only one is available in stock*

name: 'Five Cup' E by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
A textured cup in white porcelain by internationally renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto, a stunning example from her 'Five Cups' series.

This statement piece of Ikuko tableware measures approx: h: 6.5cm x dia: 9cm

Ikuko's makers mark is present on the base.

*Please note, due to the bespoke nature of this series only one is available in stock*

name: 'Five Cup' D by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
A Spiky Cup in white porcelain by internationally renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto, a stunning example from her 'Five Cups' series of pieces.

This statement piece of Ikuko tableware measures approx: h:7cm x dia: 8cm

Ikukos makers mark is present on the base.

*Please note, due to the bespoke nature of this series only one is available in stock*

name: Vase #12 by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
Sculptural vase in white porcelain by renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto.

Part of the 'Fifteen Vases' series by Ikuko. Ikuko's makers mark is on the base.

Size: H: 10.5cm

name: Jug by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
An exquisite large porcelain Jug by Ikuko Iwamoto.

Covered in dots individually hand created from porcelain slip these jugs are available in either plain white with coloured dots in a variety of colours.

Currently in stock:
Plain White Dotty - SOLD
Lime Green Dotty
Dark Blue Dotty - SOLD
Pale Yellow Dotty

Ikuko's makers mark is on the base.

Size: H: 16.5cm x Dia: 40cm

name: Vase #10 by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
Sculptural vase in white porcelain by renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto.

Part of the 'Fifteen Vases' series by Ikuko.  Ikuko's makers mark is on the base.

Size: H: 12 cm

name: Spiky Kinorhyncha Beaker by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
A stunning spiky white porcelain beaker by renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto.

The beaker measures approx: h: 7cm x dia: 6.5cm

Ikuko's makers mark is on the base.

name: Spiky Spiky Bowl by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
Black Spiky Spiky Bowl - statement piece by Ikuko Iwamoto.

In porcelain with black metallic glaze fading to white on the tips of the spikes.

A truly unique piece of contemporary ceramics from this renowned maker.

Size: H: 8cm x ?

name: Kinorhyncha Beakers by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
'Kinorhyncha' Beakers in white porcelain by renowned ceramicist Ikuko Iwamoto.

Available in small or large sizes.  Ikuko's makers mark is found on the base.

Sizes (approximate):

Small: h: 8cm x w: 7cm
Large: h: 11cm x 7.5cm

name: Crash Helmet Fairy by Samantha Bryan
description:
"Brains Crash Helmet, developed for accident prone fairies"...

Watch out! This cheeky chap has his crash helmet donned, beware of some brisk flying antics! No crashing please! 

This beautiful fairy has been created with amazing attention to detail by Samantha Bryan in her West Yorkshire based fairy workshop.  The use of materials, including hand dyed leathers and found objects in Samantha's pieces is truly astounding and each fairy has a real unique character all of their own, it goes without saying that no two are ever alike.  

Following on from Samantha's exhibition at Snug in 2012 which saw fairies fluttering and busying themselves all over Snug, we are delighted to have a number of fairies looking for new homes in which to sprinkle their fairy dust! 

This fellow wears:

Flight suit: Light blue hand dyed leather with contrasting dark blue patches.

Helmet: Sturdy nut with blue strap.

Goggles: Standard, brown rimmed.

Flight pumps: Light Blue leather.

Each fairy stands on approx 22cm high on a 7cm sq wood block base with descriptive quote. Overall height: 29.5cm

Please note postage/shipping costs reflect the delicate nature of the piece.

name: 'Flight Suits Need Not Be Frumpy' by Samantha Bryan.
description:
"Flight Suits Need Not Be Frumpy"...

 This beautiful fairy wall piece has been created with amazing attention to detail by Samantha Bryan in her West Yorkshire based fairy workshop.  The use of materials, including hand dyed leathers and found objects in Samantha's pieces is truly astounding and each fairy has a real unique character all of their own, it goes without saying that no two are ever alike.  

Following on from Samantha's exhibition at Snug in 2012 which saw fairies fluttering and busying themselves all over Snug, we are delighted to have a number of fairies looking for new homes in which to sprinkle their fairy dust! 

This unique original wall piece features a most dapper looking Fairy fellow!:

Flight suit: Yellow floral with blue bow tie.

Helmet: Acorn with blue strap.

Goggles: Standard, brown rimmed.

This wall piece comes complete with rear fixings all ready to hang on the wall and measures approx:

W:21cm x 21cm x Depth to wall:5.5cm 

Please note postage/shipping costs reflect the delicate nature of the piece

name: 'Thermal Headwear Fairy' by Samantha Bryan.
description:
"Brains Thermal Headwear for Fairies, vital for high altitude flying"... 

This beautiful fairy has been created with amazing attention to detail by Samantha Bryan in her West Yorkshire based fairy workshop.  The use of materials, including hand dyed leathers and found objects in Samantha's pieces is truly astounding and each fairy has a real unique character all of their own, it goes without saying that no two are ever alike.  

Following on from Samantha's exhibition at Snug in 2012 which saw fairies fluttering and busying themselves all over Snug, we are delighted to have a number of fairies looking for new homes in which to sprinkle their fairy dust! 

This fellow wears:

Flight suit: Light blue hand dyed leather with contrasting brown and pale orange patches.

Helmet: Orange Thermal Headwear.

Goggles: Brass.

Flight pumps: Light Blue leather.

Each fairy stands on approx 22cm high on a 7cm sq wood block base with descriptive quote. Overall height: 29.5cm

Please note postage/shipping costs reflect the delicate nature of the piece

name: Cups by Jo Davies.
description:
Hand thrown Cups in white porcelain by London based ceramicist Jo Davies.

Each cup is unique due to the throwing process and these throwing lines make them a joy to hold, we've found them perfect for our nice strong morning coffee here at Snug!

Available in two sizes, medium and large:

Med: H: 8.5cm x Dia: 7cm 
Large: H: 9cm x Dia: 9cm
*please note due to variations in the throwing process, sizes are approximate*

Each Cup is stamped with Jo's makers mark on the base.

name: 'Speak' Vase #1 by Jo Davies.
description:
Hand thrown porcelain Vase by London based ceramicist Jo Davies.

Available in white slight crackle glaze or black manganese.

Perfect for a single stem flower, there are slight variations in size due to the making process but average dimensions are: H:14cm x Dia: 8cm

Each Vase is stamped with Jo's makers mark on the base.

name: Fluted Rim Vessel by Jo Davies.
description:
Hand thrown porcelain statement vessel by London based ceramicist Jo Davies.

This one-off piece is finished in manganese black glaze.  Made using thrown & constructed components to create the vessel with fluted neck and rim.

The vessel measures approx:

H: 25cm x Dia: 12cm

name: Teapot by Derek Wilson.
description:
An exquisite piece of porcelain tableware be renowned ceramicist Derek Wilson.

This stunning teapot is finished in a pale celadon glaze and has Derek's makers mark impressed both under the lid and on the base of the teapot.

Its approximate measurements are: h: 18.5cm (inc handle) x dia: 11.5cm 


*Please note: Wood block not included - for display purposes only*

name: Cup Set #1 by Derek Wilson.
description:
Pair of hand thrown cups in porcelain with pale celedon glaze complete with dark grey slab built stoneware tray by renowned ceramicist Derek Wilson.

Complete with Derek's makers mark impressed underneath both cups and the tray.

This stunning sculptural yet functional cup set measures:

Cups: H: 10cm x Dia: 7cm
Tray: L: 17cm x 9.5cm

*Please not: Wood block in images not included - for illustration purposes only*

name: Bowl #1 by Derek Wilson.
description:
A hand thrown bowl in pale celedon porcelain by renowned ceramicist Derek Wilson.

In Derek's signature shape, these bowls vary slightly in size due to the making process but measure approx: h: 9cm x dia: 15.5cm.

Each bowl is stamped with Derek's makers mark on the base.

name: Cluster of 3 #2 - Porcelain Vessels by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A nesting cluster/set of 3 medium, small and tiny slip cast shallow ceramic vessels by multi award winning designer-maker, Jill Shaddock.

This set of vessels is made up of a medium shallow vessel in matt dark grey with teal/grey interior and pale banding on the rim. A small shallow vessel in matt yellow outer, dark grey inner and pale and grey banding and a tiny shallow vessel in teal outer, white inner with pale and grey banding.

Each vessel measures approx:

Medium: Dia: 9cm x H: 4cm
Small: Dia: 7cm x H: 3cm
Tiny: Dia: 4.2cm x H: 2cm

name: Vase #3 by Jill Shaddock.
description:
A small unique slip cast semi-porcelain Vase by award winning designer - maker Jill Shaddock.  This is a Series 2 Vase which features a hi-gloss glazed interior contrasting with a matt finished exterior.

Due to the making process, each of Jill's pieces is completely unique, this vase features a slash cut - angled top is finished in matt dark grey outer with a gloss teal interior with grey, teal and white contrasting banding on the rim of the vase.  Perfect for a single stem flower.

Size: h: 8.6cm x base dia: 6cm

name: Tower Vases by Jill Shaddock
description:
New Tower Vases on the way very soon for Autumn/Winter at Snug!

A set of three semi-porcelain and birch ply vases by award winning Ceramic Designer - Maker Jill Shaddock.

This bespoke set has been designed and produced by Jill exclusively for the Snug 3rd Birthday. Each vase features a matt exterior with contrasting hi-gloss glazed interior and a turned birch ply base.  Each Vase features Jill's signature banding on the rims denoting each layer of coloured slip used to create the vessel.

Vase 1: Matt white outer, gloss light grey inner, pale and grey banding. Dimensions: H: 14cm x Dia: 4.2cm
Vase 2: Matt mid grey outer, gloss dark grey inner, pale and grey banding. Dimensions: H: 18.5cm x Dia: 4.2cm
Vase 3: Matt dark grey outer, gloss white inner, pale and grey banding. Dimensions: H:23cm x Dia:4.2cm

This selection available only as a set of 3.
  
*NOW SOLD* Individual Tower Vases coming soon to Snug.

name: Bone China Vessels by Keith Varney.
description:
Slip cast bone china sculptural vessels, produced in limited editions by Award Winning Ceramicist Keith Varney in his Somerset studio.

The faceted flowing forms, created through intuitive mark making, are animated by light and shade. These translucent and pure white vessels, the result of the interplay of material and process, posses a natural organic quality and the diamond polished silky surfaces are invitingly tactile.

The straight sided vessels are available in three heights, medium and tall, which measure approximately:

Small: Dia: 5.5cm x H: 16.6cm
Medium: Dia: 5.5 - 5.7cm x H: 20.4cm
Tall: Currently out of stock.

Two new shapes are also now available in Small Narrow and Tapered, which measure:

Small Narrow: Dia: 3.5cm x H: 16.5cm
Tapered: Dia: 5.5 - 2.5cm x H: 16.5cm


Please note, the postage/shipping costs reflect the delicate nature of the pieces and subsequent packing needed for safe transportation

name: Line Vessel #31 in Manganese Black by Sara Flynn
description:
A large statement vessel form in porcelain with black manganese glaze by internationally renowned ceramicist Sara Flynn.

This stunning and unique piece of contemporary ceramics is approximately 19.5 cm tall with a diameter of 17 cm.

The piece is stamped with Sara's makers mark towards the base.

name: Hipped Vessel #43 by Sara Flynn
description:
A statement vessel form in porcelain by internationally renowned and collected ceramicist Sara Flynn.

Hipped Vessel #43 is a stunning example of Sara's latest work and is finished in celedon.

This stunning and unique piece of contemporary ceramics is approximately 18 cm tall with a diameter of 14 cm.

The piece is stamped with Sara's makers mark towards the base.

name: 'Fox & Wolf' Original Framed Papercut by Mr Yen.
description:
'Fox & Wolf' is a beautifully graphic original papercut by Yorkshire based artist/designer Jonathan Chapman - also known under his pseudonym 'Mr Yen'.

Cut from black card, this striking hand cut piece is mounted on and overmatted  with soft white archival card and framed in a solid oak deep set frame measuring:

w:32.5cm x h:42.5cm

*Now available - 'Get The Look' option including the stunning Jill Shaddock Vessels as depicted in our styled shot, comprising:

1x Series 2 Vase in grey.
1x Tiny Vessel in white.
1x Tiny Shallow Vessel in light grey.

Check the drop down menu to make your selection.*

options.name: Get The Look! Framed Papercut including Jill Shaddock Ceramics.

name: 'Twa Corbies' Original Framed Papercut by Sarah Morpeth.
description:
A stunning triptych of original papercuts by Northumberland based Sarah Morpeth inspired by the 'Twa Corbies' poem/ballad.

Each papercut depicting the two crows and a section of the text have also been hand painted by Sarah and are mounted in a white box type frame overlaid onto further sections of the original text, creating a wonderful depth and shadow to the piece. 

This fabulous piece of contemporary papercutting measures:

Frame: w: 44.5cm x h:31cm

*Now available - 'Get The Look' option including the trio of stunning black manganese Porcelain Vessels by internationally renowned ceramicist Sarah Flynn as depicted in our styled shot, comprising:

2x Tiny Altered Porcelain Vessels in black manganese. 
1x Medium Altered Porcelain Vessel in black manganese .

Check the drop down menu to make your selection.*

options.name: Get The Look! Original Framed Papercut including Set of Sarah Flynn Ceramics

name: 'Botanicals' Original Framed Papercuts by Sarah Morpeth.
description:
A beautiful collection of 5 original papercuts by Northumberland based Sarah Morpeth on a botanical theme.

Each papercut depicting the botanicals are mounted in a white box type frame overlaid onto further hand painted stencilled sections echoing the papercuts, creating a wonderful depth to the piece which looks fantastic with light playing across it. 

This fabulous piece of contemporary papercutting measures:

Frame: w: 44.5cm x h:27cm

*Now available - 'Get The Look' option including the trio of stunning Porcelain Vessels by ceramicist Justine Allison as depicted in our styled shot, comprising:

2x Tiny white Porcelain Vessels. 
1x Dark glaze lined Porcelain Vessel.

Check the drop down menu to make your selection.*

options.name: Get The Look! Framed Papercuts including Set of Justine Allison Ceramics

name: 'Kiota Michozi' in white by Gemma Truman.
description:
A beautiful hand-blown sculptural glass vessel by contemporary glassmaker Gemma Truman.

Due to the glass blowing process each of Gemma's pieces is a totally unique piece of stunning sculptural glass. This one is in white opaque glass and stands just under 30cm tall.

name: 'Kiota Michozi' in Orange by Gemma Truman.
description:
A beautiful hand-blown sculptural glass vessel by contemporary glassmaker Gemma Truman.

Due to the glass blowing process each of Gemma's pieces is a totally unique piece of stunning sculptural glass. This one is in orange opaque glass and stands approximately 30cm tall.

name: 'Kiota Michozi' in Green by Gemma Truman.
description:
A beautiful hand-blown sculptural glass vessel by contemporary glassmaker Gemma Truman.

Due to the glass blowing process each of Gemma's pieces is a totally unique piece of stunning sculptural glass. This one is in green opaque glass and stands approximately 30cm tall.

name: 'Mini Kiota' Sculptural Glass by Gemma Truman.
description:
A selection of beautiful sculptural mini vessels individually blown by glass maker Gemma Truman.

Each vessel is completely unique and is a great introduction to a collection of Contemporary Studio Glass.  The colours currently available in deeply vibrant opaques are:

Taxi Cab Yellow. NOW SOLD 
Fresh Olive Green. NOW SOLD
Purple.
Steel Blue.
Dark Crimson/Red. NOW SOLD

Due to their bespoke nature the Mini Kiota vary slightly in size but are generally approx: h: 10-13cm x dia: 5-6cm.

Please note, the Mini Kiota are priced individually starting at 30 to 40 each depending on colour and size. See menu above.

name: Set of 3 'Punctuated Porcelain' Vessels by Sheenagh Green.
description:
A set of three hand thrown small vessels presented on an Oak 'tray' by Irish ceramicist Sheenagh Green.

The vessels are white porcelain with black markings - two dots on one side contrasting with a delicate line on the other applied using an inlay technique.

Each vessel measures approx: H: 7cm x Dia: 7cm
Oak block/tray: L: 35cm x W: 9.5cm

Each Vessel has Sheenaghs makers mark impressed on the base.

name: 'Bow Lamp' by Liam Treanor.
description:
New at Snug is the Bow Lamp by Liam Treanor.

This beautifully finished floor lamp is more or less unique in a design-led lighting market, which features very few original timber-based products.

The Bow floor lamp uses the wonderful properties of wood to allow a curved component to be produced from straight timber through the process of steam bending.

Available in either Ash or Oak.

The lamp is provided with a large globe bulb.

Dimensions: H 160, W 30, D 30cm

name: 'Pole' Bench by Sebastian Cox.
description:
This beautiful bench created by Sebastian Cox is made from coppiced hazel - an abundant and sustainable wood, harvested by hand in Lincolnshire for the seat rods and scorched Ash making up the two ends and crossbrace.

The bench is a stunning combination of exquisite craftsmanship, fine detailing and a rustic yet contemporary aesthetic.

It measures:  L: 100cm x W: 40cm x H: 47cm

name: 'Lop & Top' Candelabra by Sebastian Cox.
description:
This stunningly crafted candelabra has been created by Sebastian Cox from coppiced hazel, an abundant and sustainable wood harvested by Sebastian in Lincolnshire woodland.

The rustic woodland textures contrast beautifully with the elegant contemporary design.

The candelabra measures approx: L: 30cm x W: 11cm x H: 20cm

A set of 4 candles are included.

*ONLY ONE IN STOCK*

name: Guinomi Cup by Ikuko Iwamoto.
description:
Unique sculptural sake cups in white porcelain by Ikuko Iwamoto.

Available in plain white or a selection of spotty colours.

*Plain White now sold out*

*Please note: Price is per cup. Set of 4 for illustration purposes only*

Size: H: 5cm x Dia: 6.5cm

name: 'Keep Moving' Ltd Edition Giclee Print by EC.
description:
'Keep Moving' - part of a new series of bicycling inspired prints by Ed Chadwick. Featuring a inspirational quote from Albert Einstein.

A limited edition of 150 giclee, printed onto 250gsm soft white slightly textured handmade paper. Each print is produced by Ed in his little attic studio and is signed and numbered in pencil.

Available in either A4 or A3 sizes and are supplied unmounted, shipped either flat for small prints or carefully rolled in a tube for the larger size.

*NOW FREE SHIPPING*

name: 'Utopia' Ltd Edition Giclee Print by EC.
description:
'Utopia' - part of a new series of bicycling inspired prints by Ed Chadwick.  Featuring a inspirational quote from HG Wells.

A limited edition of 150 giclee, printed onto 250gsm soft white slightly textured handmade paper. Each print is produced by Ed in his little attic studio and is signed and numbered in pencil.

Available in either A4 or A3 sizes and are supplied unmounted, shipped either flat for small prints or carefully rolled in a tube for the larger size.

*NOW FREE SHIPPING*

name: 'An Adult on a Bicycle' Ltd Edition Giclee Print by EC.
description:
'An Adult on a Bicycle' - part of a new series of bicycling inspired prints by Ed Chadwick. Featuring a inspirational quote from HG Wells.

A limited edition of 150 giclee, printed onto 250gsm soft white slightly textured handmade paper. Each print is produced by Ed in his little attic studio and is signed and numbered in pencil.

Available in either A4 or A3 sizes and are supplied unmounted, shipped either flat for small prints or carefully rolled in a tube for the larger size.

*NOW FREE SHIPPING*

name: 'Time Flies' Original Screen Print by Rebecca J Kaye.
description:
An original limited edition (of 50) screen print by Edinburgh based illustrator Rebecca J Kaye.

Hand printed in two colours (Black & Red) on 270gsm paper the print is signed and numbered in pencil by Rebecca.

Dimensions:

Overall size: 30 x 40 cm

The print is supplied unframed, carefully wrapped and shipped flat.

name: 'A Visual Compendium' Litho Print by Rebecca J Kaye.
description:
A stunning litho print on heavy weight paper, produced in Scotland by Edinburgh based bicycling enthusiast and esteemed designer/illustrator Rebecca J Kaye. 

'A Visual Compendium of Cycling Parts & Terms' is a delightfully quirky depiction of the words we know to be bike related and their rather less important more mundane uses! Illustrated in RJK's unmistakable style with a great palette of bright colours the print measures:

A2 (59.4x42cm approx)

Please note: The print/poster is supplied unframed, carefully packed and shipped in a stout postage tube. Image of framed piece for illustration purposes, we can frame the print for extra cost, email us for details and prices.

name: Set of Bike Cards by Rebecca J Kaye.
description:
A set of 3 lovely greetings cards on a bike theme by Edinburgh based illustrator Rebecca J Kaye.

These are reproductions of her '1 Of Your 5 A Day', 'Highland Fling' and 'Track Cyclist' designs. Litho printed onto nice card and supplied with a bright contrasting envelope, the cards are blank inside for you to scribble a cheeky bike related message of your choice!

Size: approx 10.5 x 15 cm

name: 'Commuter 2012' Original Screen Print by Rebecca J Kaye.
description:
*ONLY ONE LEFT*

An original limited edition (of 50) screen print by Edinburgh based illustrator Rebecca J Kaye.

The print is supplied with a cut window mount and a hardboard backing all ready to pop into a frame of your choice.  The print is also signed, titled and numbered in pencil by Rebecca.

Dimensions:

Print: approx 18 x 18 cm
Overall size including mount: 23 x 23 cm

The print is supplied unframed, carefully wrapped and shipped flat.

name: 'Brains Fight Helmets For Fairies' Ltd Edition Book by Samantha Bryan
description:
A limited edition Artist book handmade by Samantha Bryan in a limited edition of 100 copies.

Featuring images of Samantha's cheeky fairy creations modelling their favourite headwear!

Each book individually signed & numbered by Samantha.

name: 'Mythical Creatures' Postcard Book by Girls Who Draw.
description:
A delightful book of postcards featuring a selection of illustrations along the theme 'Mythical Creatures' by members of the 'Girls Who Draw' collective.

Limited edition.

Large size postcards.

name: 'Red Hares' - Gocco Print by Dee Beale.
description:
'Red Hares' - A limited edition ( of 150 ) gocco print by Dee Beale.

Available either unframed or framed in a simple white frame with the print mounted on white archival board with a matching white window mount.

Each print is signed and numbered by Dee.

Print size: W: 25.5 cm x H: 18 cm.

Frame size: W: 42cm x H: 32 cm.

Unframed prints are posted flat with a foamboard protective backing.

name: 'Magic Tree & Birds' Origial Screenprint by Karoline Rerrie.
description:
'Magic Tree & Birds' - A delightful original two colour screenprint by illustrator Karoline Rerrie.

Printed by hand by Karoline in two lovely shades of green on 240gsm water colour paper in a limited edition of 50.

Print sized: h: 35cm x w: 27cm

name: 'Dancing Girls' - Original Screenprint by Karoline Rerrie.
description:
'Dancing Girls' - Original two colour screenprint by illustrator Karoline Rerrie.

Printed by hand by Karoline in light blue and teal on 240gsm water colour paper in a limited edition of 50.

Print sized: h: 35cm x w: 27cm

name: 'Birdhouse Highrise' Original Print bt Yee Ting Kuit.
description:
A most perfect abode for a collection of twitterers!

This delightful brightly coloured original giclee print by Manchester based illustrator Yee Ting Kuit is printed on 240gsm matt paper this A4 sized print and is limited to an edition of just 50.  Each print is signed and numbered by Yee in pencil.

Supplied unframed, carefully wrapped and shipped flat.

name: 30's Racer by Clinton Pilkington.
description:
Lovingly handmade in English Oak by furniture Designer-Maker Clinton Pilkington.  Inspired by racing cars of the 30's Clinton's creation features stunning attention to detail, from the lightly Danish oiled finish of the Oak to the turned aluminium axle covers.  It is the perfect addition to any automotive enthusiasts collection.

Tech spec:

Body: Hand formed and finished English Oak lightly polished with Danish Oil.
Chassis: Mild steel axles, chrome hubcaps and turned aluminium axle covers.
Wheels: Finest red plastic with black rubber tyres.

Dimensions:

L: 290mm
H: 125mm
W: 130mm
Front Track: 90mm
Rear Track: 100mm

name: 'Camper' Original Framed Papercut by Hannah Greenwood.
description:
Who's ready for the summer holidays?

A delightful, intricate original papercut by Hebden Bridge based designer-illustrator Hannah Greenwood.  This lovely VW Camper is all packed up ready for a trip including a cheeky bucket & spade, now where's the beach?  Cut by Hannah from white heavyweight paper then mounted onto a teal/grey backing the 'Camper' is presented in a simple white box frame.

Framed piece measures:

24cm x 24cm.

*Now available - 'Get The Look' option including the stunning Jill Shaddock Ceramic Vase as depicted in our styled shot. Check the drop down menu to make your selection.*

options.name: Get The Look! Original Framed Papercut including Jill Shaddock Vase.

name: 60's Racer by Clinton Pilkington.
description:
NEW 60's RACER COMING SOON IN ASH & CHERRYWOOD

Lovingly handmade in English Oak by furniture Designer-Maker Clinton Pilkington with design input from Snug Owner Ed Chadwick.  Inspired by racing cars of the 60's Clinton's creation features stunning attention to detail, from the lightly Danish oiled finish of the Oak to the turned aluminium axle covers.  It is the perfect addition to any automotive enthusiasts collection.

Tech spec:

Body: Hand formed and finished English Oak lightly polished with Danish Oil.
Chassis: Mild steel axles, chrome hubcaps and turned aluminium axle covers.
Wheels: Finest red plastic with black rubber tyres.

Dimensions:

L: 310mm 
H: 97mm
W: 150mm
Front Track: 120mm 
Rear Track: 100mm

name: Pourer by Derek Wilson.
description:
A delightful piece of porcelain tableware by renowned ceramicict Derek Wilson, this pourer is finished in pale celedon.

Derek's makers mark is impressed on the base.  The pourer measures approx:

Dia: 6.5 cm x H: 9cm x W (inc handle): 15cm

description:

*Green Crackle glaze - Currently Out of Stock*

This sculptural yet functional piece of table ware measures approx:

H: 6.5cm x Dia: 10cm.

description:

Normal bangle size: approx 6.5cm diameter internal aperture.

A selection available, see descriptions.

Red/Black distressed deck  with red back

name: Brooch #3 by Rasha Alkhatib.
description:
Brooch in laser cut translucent acrylic with geometric overlayed design in laser cut walnut by Rasha Alkhatib.

Available in purple acrylic.

Size: l: 5cm x h: 3cm

description:

Available in blue acrylic.

name: Heart Concertina Papercut Book by Sarah Morpeth.
Heart & Birds Papercut Artist Book by Sarah Morpeth.
Toboggan Coffee Table in Solid Oak by Clinton Pilkington.
description:
Designed and handcrafted by designer/maker Clinton Pilkington, this one-off coffee table in solid English Oak is a triumph of simple design and exquisite craftsmanship.

Inspired by scandinavian design, there is a humourous nod to this in its 'tobogganesque' appearance and construction.

Measuring: L90cm x W38cm x H40cm.  This unique bespoke piece is the perfect complement to any contemporary interior.

name: Sea Defence Lamp by Andy Murray.
description:
Created by award winning designer/maker Andy Murray, Sea Defence is a beautiful and functional collection of furniture bringing together the sculptural, strong and iconic nature of sea defences, creating elegant, usable functional pieces of furniture.

The collection is made up from the simple shape inspired by Sea Defences, that line the coasts of Britain.

This layered light is hand crafted in Scotland from carefully selected materials, layered birch is cut to this sculptural shape, carefully pressed and finished by hand.

The lamp is in natural birch and stands at just under 2m high, comes complete with grey/silver fabric flex at approx 3m long and plain cream fabric shade and lightbulb.

This lamp is now available again as a special order, 6-8 week delivery time.

name: 'Boddingtons Brewery Manchester' Original Photograph by Edward Chadwick
description:
Boddingtons Brewery @ Night by Edward Chadwick.

Limited Edition Original Black & White Photograph.

Mounted & Overmatted on Archival Board. 30x40cm Dark Birch Frame.

Edition of 50. Signed & Numbered by the Photographer.

Also available unframed.

*Other sizes available to order*

For more Edward Chadwick photographs visit:

www.edchadwickphotography.com

description:

name: Rocking Bowls by Cj O'Neill.
description:
Stunning spherical 'rocking' bowls in white porcelain by Manchester based ceramicist Cj O'Neill.   

Available either plain or pierced with small holes in a circular design.

Size: H: 8cm x Dia: 15cm


*Please note: Price is per bowl. Set of 3 for illustration purposes only*

name: Oval 3 Vessel by Sarah Thirlwell
description:
Oval 3 Vessel by renowned contemporary turner Sarah Thirlwell.

Turned from laminated reclaimed perspex in subtle tones of whites, apricots and greys with a base of laminated Birch Ply this beautiful vessel stands approximately 16cm tall and is approximately 57cm round.

All vessels have a small test tube fitted into the top so they can carry a single large flower or grass stem or several small ones.

name: Snug 10 Gift Voucher.
description:
The perfect gift for anyone who's a fan of the lovely things we stock in Snug.

These lovingly designed and presented gift vouchers can either be redeemed in person at Snug or alternatively, they come with a unique code that can be used at the checkout section here in our online shop.

Usual gift voucher terms & conditions apply. Valid for 12months from date of purchase.

name: Photowalk with Ed Chadwick.
description:
ONLY ONE PLACE LEFT!

An introduction to Landscape Photography in the beautiful Autumnal Calder Valley.

SUNDAY 10th NOVEMBER 2013.

Join Snug Gallery owner and award winning photographer Ed Chadwick as he leads a Photowalk through the picturesque Pennine town of Hebden Bridge and beyond - up into the surrounding hills. Exploring the Autumn countryside in all its stunning colour.

The Photowalk will begin at Snug Gallery on Market St, Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire (HX7 6AA) at 10:30am and finish with a debrief/reflection session at the Stubbing Wharf Pub at approximately 2:00pm possibly over a pint of fine Ale if you are so inclined. Along the way, Ed will lead you to some of the most spectacular vantage points in the area and offer advice and tuition in a number of areas of image capture, from exposure to composition, covering both colour & black & white.

Please bring your camera (dslr preferred but not essential), a decent pair of walking boots and as it's November please dress accordingly for all weather. Please note there will be a number of steep paths and uneven terrain to be negotiated during the walk.

Strictly limited numbers - so book early to avoid disappointment! Ed looks forward to welcoming you along!

Workshop Ability Requirement: Medium.

If you need any further information, please don't hesitate to send us an email.
